lead_paragraph: West Virginia University wants a judge to dismiss counterclaims that Rich Rodriguez raised to its lawsuit over his $4 million buyout, arguing he cannot benefit from a contract while refusing to comply with parts of it. Rodriguez claims he signed his contract under false pretenses, expecting verbal promises by the university to be kept. The university argues that Rodriguez knew what he was doing and had help from lawyers, financial advisers and agents.
